title: Ex-Diamond player seeking Diamond Ranked team for serious personal Growth
body:
Hi guys. I finished season 4 as a diamond IV. I am looking for a diamond team to tryout in in the hopes that i could join and play competitive ranked 5's once again. 

I have been playing Since season 2, i have lots of game experience and knowledge.

I coached for free on lol-coaching.net for 4 months to get better at teaching and communicating while passing knowledge onto lower tier players. my favorite lanes are ADC and MID, but i am an all rounder player. I can play anywhere, but i have the least experience in the Jungle. 

Please consider me. Thank you!
